1348228 THE COMMANDERS- IN- CHIEF (CHANGE IN DESIGNATION) ACT, 1955
ACT NO. 19 OF 1955 AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN ENACTMENTS FOR THE PURPOSE OF CHANGINGTHE DESIGNA [ 3rd May, 1955.]
243629 1 Short title and commencement.
842403 1This Act may be called the Commanders- in- Chief (Change in Designation) Act, 1955.
1396408 2It shall come into force on such date 1 as the Central Government may, by notification in the Official Gazette, appoint.
1539904 2[ Amendment of certain enactments.] Rep. by the Repealing and Amending Act, 1960 (58 of 1960), s. 2 and Sch. I.
123487 3Construction of references to Commanders- in- Chief in enactments or instruments. Any reference, by whatever form of words, to the Commander- in- Chief of the regular Army, the Commander- in- Chief of the Indian Navy, and the Commander- in- Chief of the Air Force, in any law for the time being in force, or in any instrument or other document, shall be construed as a reference to the Chief of the Army Staff, the Chief of the Naval Staff, and the Chief of the Air Staff respectively. [ THE SCHEDULE.] Rep. by the Repealing and Amending Act, 1960 (58 of 1960), s. 2 and Sch. I.
999999 1 7th May, 1955, vide Notification No. S. R. O. 2 E, dated the 7th May, 1955, Gazette of India, 1955, Extraordinary, Pt. II, Sec. 4, p. 3.
